author: swp0x0
content:
another day another question,
what's the rationale for keeping the effective balance in the validator struct and the actual balance as a direct member of the beacon state?
I suspect it has something to do with reusing the intermediate leaves of the Beacon state root across epochs; probably, the validators list doesn't need to be re-computed every epoch.

author: ralexstokes
content: yes, balances change much more frequently than effective balances and so the idea is to have a separate list so you can localize (and then more precisely optimize) hashing overhead of updating the Beacon State ssz machinery
